attributes.action: A petition to get the prime Minister to create an email facility where we can contact him
attributes.additional_details:
I have an idea that the Government can utilise that will create many jobs, earn the Government a lot of money, help the British people with safety issues and dislocate a certain type of criminality; BUT I cannot email Mr Cameron and getting in touch with any minister seems difficult.

My idea is in need of implementation immediately and is a billion pound sustainable idea that will also create future employment- I am not willing to give it up without remuneration and so no matter what ethics I hold- I cannot just post it.

We need to be able to contact the prime minister.
